SELECT a.id AS "id", a.`name` AS "name", a.serial_num AS "serialNum", a.self_num AS "selfNum", a.depict AS "depict", a.remark AS "remark" FROM im_product_info a where a.org_id=#{param.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and CONCAT(a.`name`,a.serial_num,a.self_num) like CONCAT('%',#{param.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
